definition: one of the three main divisions of the Book of Songs 詩經|诗经

sentences.english: Paggy hear lesser, also think I should be strong for children.
sentences.chinese: 佩琪聽到小雅的話，也覺得本人該爲孩子堅強起來。

sentences.english: Ling made sea find hui shan share photos and lesser.
sentences.chinese: 素玲讓陸海找出慧珊的照片和小雅分享。

sentences.english: As a poet, Xiaoya is quiet.
sentences.chinese: 作爲詩人，小雅是寧靜的。

sentences.english: Aunt Mimi to lesser tells the story of what happened.
sentences.chinese: 咪咪阿姨給小雅講述了曾經發生的故事。

sentences.english: Mimi comfort lesser, grandpa will be fine, jingjing has been blame her.
sentences.chinese: 咪咪安慰小雅，爺爺不會有事，晶晶卻一直在責怪她。

sentences.english: Lesser told aunt Mimi, see the sea in the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 小雅告訴咪咪阿姨，看到陸海在中藥店徘徊。

sentences.english: Jason is the fiance of small friendship, the afterward month is their to order a wedding feast.
sentences.chinese: 傑森是小雅的未婚夫，下個月就是他們的訂婚宴。

sentences.english: Lesser took the mother of all design, were watching, Peter to the telephone.
sentences.chinese: 小雅接過媽媽的全部設計，正看着，彼德來了電話。

sentences.english: As a friend, Xiaoya is open.
sentences.chinese: 作爲朋友，小雅是豪放的。

sentences.english: Wen Xiaoya is good at capturing the twinkling moments of an event.
sentences.chinese: 溫小雅善於捕捉事件中的瞬間狀態。

sentences.english: Tony saw the lesser and Paul were gone, some worry.
sentences.chinese: 託尼見小雅和保羅都不見了，有些擔心。

sentences.english: Xiaoya enters the national team through competition.
sentences.chinese: 小雅通過了比賽進入了國家集訓隊。

sentences.english: Small nan is tracking the brother-in-law shuttle friends, lesser sister calling.
sentences.chinese: 小楠正跟蹤着姐夫梭朋，小雅姐打來電話。

sentences.english: Paul told her, I must tell xiao ya know, including work and feelings.
sentences.chinese: 保羅告訴她，自己要跟小雅講明白，包括工作和感情。

sentences.english: After the introduction, cousin will bring lesser back home.
sentences.chinese: 介紹過後，表哥將小雅帶回家裏。

sentences.english: This is me reading poetry Xiaoya feeling.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我讀小雅詩集的感覺。
